item.title: Update 1.3.4 released
item.description:
• Add /vaporwave and /unvaporwave
  • Fixed right-click showing the wrong context menu in chat bubbles
  • Fix bug where you could be silently disconnected (!)
  • Fixed the logo being misaligned on mobile. Thanks to Ahmad for the fix.
  • Added /hat horse
  • Added the "bear" hat for blessed

item.title: Update 1.3.3 released
item.description:
• Added admins
  • Fixed ban reason not showing up

item.title: Update 1.3.2 released
item.description:
• Fixed /pawn, /linux, and /triggered. Thanks to donutscout for reporting this
  • Whitelisted the domains bonzi.gay, imgbb.co, and imgur.com for /image
  • YouTube videos no longer autoplay
  • A popup which explaining blessed appears when you get blessed
  • Blessed users can now multihat. The /hat command can be used with at most 3 hats at a time, such as /hat tophat dank bfdi
  • Added the blessed exclusive hats /hat cigar and /hat illuminati
  • Added skins for blessed users. Current ones are /glow and /noob
    • Thanks to Red Yellow for the noob skin
  • All blessed features are available to everyone in private rooms

item.title: Update 1.3.1 released
item.description:
This is just optimization
  • The BonziBUDDY spritesheets no longer use unused sprites, see purple
  • Profile pictures handled better now
  • You can now join before all assets finish loading

item.title: Update 1.3.0 released
item.description:
• Added timestamps to messages in the chat log
  • Added /hat witch
  • Added /hat wizard
  • Added /color white
  • Added "blessed", a VIP-like status.
    • Use /angel to turn back into an angel.
    • Use /dank for the exclusive blessed hat
  • Added /video
  • Fixed ridicolously long names

item.description:
Small little update. This should hopefully make it feel 10x less janky for now
  • Added changelog
  • Fixed stray pixels appearing in certain hats
  • Images no longer break chat log scrolling
  • Added /color cyan and /color yellow

  • Added /bass to right click
